companies.name: Nestle
companies.address: Nestlé (South Africa) (Pty) Ltd | Anslow Office Park, 8 Anslow Crescent, Bryanston, 2120
companies.other_info: Nestlé is the world’s largest food and beverage company.

companies.name: Rand Water
companies.other_info: Rand Water is the largest bulk water utility in Africa and is one of the largest in the world, providing bulk potable water to over 16 million people in Gauteng, parts of Mpumalanga, the Free State and North West – an area that stretches over 37 000 km2.

companies.name: Spoor Fisher
companies.other_info: At Spoor & Fisher, we use the power of our intellectual property expertise and authentic business insight to help our clients to protect, manage and enforce valuable IP rights.

companies.name: Elite Risk Acceptances
companies.other_info: Elite provides a personalised and tailored solution to non-life insurance and personal risk management for people with sophisticated needs.

companies.name: Actom
companies.other_info: ACTOM is the largest manufacturer, solution provider, repairer, maintainer and distributor of electro-mechanical equipment in Africa, with 33 outlets throughout Sub- Saharan Africa.

companies.name: Vox Telecommunications
companies.address: Block D, Rutherford Estate, 1 Scott Street, Waverly, 2090
companies.other_info: Innovation and insight combine in Vox, a market leading end-to-end integrated ICT and infrastructure provider and telecommunications company.

companies.name: ABSA

companies.other_info: We’re committed to finding local solutions to uniquely local challenges and everything we do is focussed on adding value.
